name: HackerHero
description:
HackathonHero is your AI co-pilot for hackathons. It eliminates common project hurdles by providing an Idea Generator, a Team Planner, and a 24/48-Hour Roadmap with integrated checklists. It acts as a virtual mentor, guiding teams step-by-step from brainstorming to a successful pitch and finished prototype.

Focus: Build fast, finish strong, and win.
